events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me well. I want to return it and get a refund.
The system classified this case under the Refund category based on keywords like 'return' and 'refund' in the customer's message.
The case has been assigned to agent Laura Smith, who specializes in order returns and refund processing.
Hello! I'm Laura from customer support. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'll help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 4589321. The jacket is too small despite choosing the size I usually wear.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label. Once we receive it, we'll issue a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds perfect. I appreciate the quick help and clear instructions to get my refund processed.
The return process has been initiated, and the prepaid label was sent to your email. Please ship the item back within 10 days to complete the refund.
Just checking in to confirm that you returned the jacket and to ask if you received the refund without any issues.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and received my refund yesterday. Thanks again for your help!
The case has been closed as the refund was completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
